alert.note: Alert for Elkhead and Park Mountains; Flat Tops (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Avalanche Warning issued November 28 at 4:37PM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: THE FOLLOWING MESSAGE IS TRANSMITTED AT THE REQUEST OF THE COLORADO AVALANCHE INFORMATION CENTER. * WHAT...Avalanche Warning * WHERE...Park Range, Elk Head Mountains, Flat Top Mountains, Elk Mountains and West Elk Mountains. * WHEN...Dangerous avalanche conditions will begin Monday night November 28 and will last through Tuesday November 29 * IMPACTS...Dangerous avalanche conditions exist in the backcountry. Heavy snow and strong winds will result in widespread avalanche activity. Human triggered avalanches are very likely. * PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS...Avoid travel on and under all steep slopes. Travel in avalanche terrain is not recommended. Consul www.colorado.gov/avalanche for detailed information. Cooperstein

area.areaDesc: Elkhead and Park Mountains; Flat Tops
